content.rendered:
AliExpress reviews, Amazon review, DSers(Oberlo) & many more!

Would you love to double up your revenue with powerful social proof and appealing UGC content?

LAI provides Shopify merchants with quick and comprehensive methods to collect product reviews from multiple sources, showcase reviews across your online stores, and build marketing strategies around product reviews.

Benefits:

  • Built-in LAI Reviews integration in our themes
  • No manual coding adjustments
  • Automatically adjust the LAI widget to theme structure

Promotion offer:

  • Discount 10% all Premium Plans

Condition of participation:

BullTheme users install LAI Reviews using discount code “LAI-BullTheme-10”

App details
